name: The Fool
description: Lighten up and be spontaneous beyond logic.
advice: but be happy in the moment.

name: The Magician
description: Have faith in your own creativity and intuition.
advice: but have the courage to speak your truth.

name: The High Priestess
description: You must cooperate with your inner spirit in order to remove distractions.
advice: but spiritual practice will guide you.

name: The Empress
description: Trust in your caring and thoughtful nature.
advice: but trust in your good intentions.

name: The Emperor
description: Reinforce sovereignty and acknowledge your potential.
advice: and so you must seek self-control.

name: The Hierophant
description: Broaden your experiences and educate yourself.
reverse: You bite the hand that feeds you
advice: but self-educating will earn you respect.

name: The Lovers
description: Careful consideration in the long-term is necessary.
advice: and making a compromise will free you.

name: The Chariot
description: Prepare for travel, taste the joy of freedom, and be receptive to people.
reverse: You know that you should make change
advice: but moving somewhere else will benefit you.

name: Strength
description: Assertively discipline yourself, set an example!
advice: but you must discipline yourself.

name: The Hermit
description: Think carefully in seclusion, tell everyone to leave you alone until you are ready.
advice: but careful, secluded thought will guide you.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Follow and accept the flow of dramatically changing patterns - you are safe here.
advice: but following the flow of events is favourable.

name: Justice
description: Observe other perspectives, subtle inferencing will yield wise assessments.
advice: but other's perspectives will guide you.

name: The Hanged Man
description: Surrender illusions of control, sometimes bad things happen to good people.
advice: so you must surrender illusions of control.

name: Death
description: Time to move on, detach from the old ways in favour of your ultimate interests.
advice: but it's time to move on.

name: Temperance
description: Identify and seek that which is missing in your life, be organized and disciplined.
reverse: You want to give up on yourself
advice: so consider what is missing in your life.

name: The Devil
description: Express your emotions and acknowledge your feelings to remain true to yourself.
advice: but avoiding subtlety will let you be honest.

name: The Tower
description: You are an agent of change, but do not leave yourself vulnerable as you plunge into the future.
advice: so mediate your dive into the future.

name: The Star
description: Connect to your higher self, quietly contemplate and listen for the voice within.
advice: and so listen to your inner voice.

name: The Moon
description: Trust your bodily instincts, meditate, be a witness and do nothing.
advice: and so stick to your instincts.

name: The Sun
description: Have confidence in your natural divinity, focus on the real positives and be a light for others.
advice: but embracing your natural divinity will let you shine.

name: Judgement
description: Release your hidden potential, divest from fruitless endeavours and trust your impulses.
advice: but you must trust your impulses and hidden potential.

name: The World
description: Do whatever you want! You cannot err so keep moving forward! Do not allow your ego to inflate.
advice: but you shall not err, dance the dance.
